txt.en: 'Frumgar faced the dragon among his slaughtered household, Wrothbláda in hand.'
'Frumgar's arm had been horribly gnawed by Scatha's sharp teeth.'
'Frumgar faced the dragon among his slaughtered household, Wrothbláda in hand...'
'Frumgar's arm had been horribly gnawed by Scatha's sharp teeth. While Fram saved his father's life, Frumgar would never fully recover from that day.'
Léothred, the Rohirric scholar, wishes to learn more about the great worm, Scatha, whose history weaves closely with that of the great warrior, Fram.
